segments.text: Yes . I'd like to buy a sweater for my husband . Which style is the latest ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: These are all the latest fashion . How do you like this white turtleneck one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like this style . But do you have any other colors ? I feel that this color doesn't suit his complexion .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We also have it in grey .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! I will take it . And could you suggest a pair of trousers to match this sweater ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's my pleasure . I think this pair of jeans will suit the sweater well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . Yes , they are perfectly matched !
segments.speaker: S2
